heading: HR00391
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION TO FAST TRACK THE DEVELOPMENT AND UPGRADING OF THE CLARK INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (CRK) TO PROVIDE BETTER ALTERNATIVE TO DECONGEST THE NINOY AQUINO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (NAIA) AND FOR THE GREATER EFFICIENCY OF THE AIR AND LAND TRANSPORT INDUSTRY IN THE PHILIPPINES
